name: Rick Rodo's Rival Restaurant Rush
description:
Rick Rodo's Rival Restaurant Rush was our entry for Ludum Dare 27. The theme for the event was 10 seconds. Rick Rodo was fairly well received and was ranked 61st for humor out of Jam entries.

(Fancy British accent)

Rick Rodo's life was changed when the buffet was discovered in 20XX. By monopolizing the buffet industry, Rodo rose to the top and became a kajillionaire. Life was all well until Luke Lucrum appeared! With his gang of Ludicrous minimum wage workers, Rodo finally met his match. In order take back his throne of King of Buffets, it looks like Rodo's going to need to infiltrate Lucrum's buffet and eat all the food with the 10* seconds.

*helpings (if you still don't get it, we're referring to food)

Developers:
Programming - Adam V. (Wizered67)
Graphics - Josh D. (Hoovyscoot), Paul K. (Pandadog123), Andrew T., Ryan G. (Viper1044)
Audio - Kevin L. (Kayfon)
Level Design - Ryan G. (Viper1044), Adam V. (Wizered67)
Voice Acting - Josh D. (Hoovyscoot), Paul K. (Pandadog123)
